note.p: Birth: 40 Middlegate Street, Great Yarmouth, Norfolk, England (18 October 1775)
Education: North Walsham Grammar School, Norfolk; Pembroke College, Cambridge (left without degree)
Career: Joined his father's bank (1796); interested in cryptograms and antiquities; his botanical collections went to Kew
References: Gudrun Richardson, 'A Norfolk Network within the Royal Society' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 27-39, plate
